abstract: Problems linked to the braking system of Boeing’s much-delayed 787 Dreamliner conspired with a dearth of new orders from Western airlines to darken the mood at the aerospace industry’s showcase event.
snippet: Problems linked to the braking system of Boeing’s much-delayed 787 Dreamliner conspired with a dearth of new orders from Western airlines to darken the mood at the aerospace industry’s showcase event.
lead_paragraph: FARNBOROUGH, England  Problems linked to the braking system of Boeing’s delayed 787 Dreamliner and a lack of orders from Western airlines darkened the mood Tuesday at the Farnborough International Airshow, the aerospace industry’s showcase annual event.

headline.main: Brakes and Other Headaches at an Aircraft Show
headline.print_headline: Brakes and Other Headaches at an Aircraft Show
